original_title: ก่อนบ่ายเดอะมูฟวี่ ตอน รักนะ…พ่อต๊ะติ๊งโหน่ง
overview: Amid the mist in the lush green mountains of the northernmost part of Thailand, at a hilltribe village that is full of fun and laughter, Tee Por, Lorsha and Ma Zhu, three good-humoured hill tribe men who are naive but not naive. It was a source of laughter for the villagers. They are the heroes of the village and loved by everyone.
title: Kon Bai The Movie
